items.title: How to Watch the Final Meteor Shower of 2025
items.description: Conditions in the US should be perfect for the final meteor shower of 2025, with no moonlight present to interfere with spotting shooting stars.

items.title: Monzo board reportedly pushed out CEO Anil over IPO timing
items.description: A key issue, reportedly, was IPO timing.

items.title: DEI Died This Year. Maybe It Was Supposed To
items.description: I’m a Black staffer at WIRED. My position feels more precarious than ever. There’s a reason for that.

items.title: Google deepens consumer credit push in India with UPI-linked card
items.description: Google has entered India's growing co-branded credit card market by partnering with Axis Bank.

items.title: Weeks after raising $100M, investors pump another $180M into hot Indian startup MoEngage
items.description: The deal valued MoEngage at "well over" $900 million post-money.

items.title: Amazon reportedly in talks to invest $10B in OpenAI as circular deals stay popular
items.description: Amazon is in early discussions to invest as much as $10 billion in OpenAI in a deal that would see the AI lab using the e-commerce giant's AI chips.
